charges.charge_description: On or about 10/17/01 in Clinton County, deft. knowingly, willfully and intentionally transport from Canada, a place outside the US, to Champlain, NY, a place w/in Customs Territor of the US, a Schedule I controlled substance, approximately 26.7 kilgrams of marijuana, in violation of Title 18, USC, Section 545 and Title 21, USC, Sections 952, 959, 960; possess a Schedule I controlled substance, to wit: approximately 26.7 kilograms of marijuana, with intent to distribute the same, in violation of Title 21, USC, Section 959. [1:01-m-380]
